def_cn: (尤指电视或广播的)新闻摘要，内容提要
def_en: In journalism, especially television or radio, a roundup of news is a summary of the main events that have happened.

def_cn: (强行对人的)驱集，聚拢，聚集
def_en: When there is a roundup of people, they are arrested or captured by the police or army and brought to one place.

def_cn: (强行对动物的)驱集，驱赶，聚集
def_en: A roundup is an occasion when cattle, horses, or other animals are collected together so that they can be counted or sold.
